items.title: Do you want to raise happy children? Parent the Danish way

visible_instructors.title: Iben Sandahl
visible_instructors.name: Iben
visible_instructors.job_title: Danish parenting expert, psychotherapist, author & educator

items.headline: This is an excellent method, if you find parenting difficult or feel overwhelmed by the pressures of being a parent
objectives_summary: Become aware of HYGGE’S social value and what brings you together as a family. In this way you can learn to prioritize time with your children.
Learn to transform negative thoughts and habits into more positive ones. You will receive various practical approaches to use for yourself and your child.
Learn how to be brave and authentic and how to teach your children authenticity too. Authenticity is the key to a happy life.

objectives_summary: It can turn the most rude, defiant, disrespectful kid around in as little as one week.
You will understand what works and what most parents do that just makes things worse.
You will be an expert in child discipline.

items.headline: Do you want to learn how to help your child? This Course will teach you everything you need to know to do so.
objectives_summary: You will know all the aspects about what it means to have in the family a person with the diagnosis of Autism Spectrum Disorder.
You will know the characteristics, definitions, and above all the capacities and the supports that these people and their families will need throughout their lives.

You will learn to relate to your child differently and due to the concepts and techniques that we will teach you, you will understand his way of thinking and you will learn to build pleasant relationships with your child.
